annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Explicitly importing specific items from a module improves readability and maintainability.
label: best_practice
reason: Explicitly importing specific items from a module improves readability and maintainability.

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Medium): Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace pollution and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.
label: sast_risk
reason: Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace pollution and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.

annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Using a specific alias for imported items can prevent name conflicts and improve code clarity.
label: best_practice
reason: Using a specific alias for imported items can prevent name conflicts and improve code clarity.

annotation: 🧠 ML Signal: Modifying the __all__ variable indicates dynamic control over what is exposed by the module.
label: ml_signal
reason: Modifying the __all__ variable indicates dynamic control over what is exposed by the module.
